metadata.name: Selenite Nova
metadata.description:
Inside the mystical cave of a tepuy, a bright flower quickly increases her brightness to capture the eye of the observer. Selenite Nova reveals herself only to the ones that need her assistance, she has the virtue of softly cleansing auras with her bright rose light.

But that's not all, her super power relies on interweaving the connection between the heart of the Earth, the Cosmos, and the heart of all living things. This special tapestry opens the flow of Love by reestablishing trust in every heart she touches. 

If Selenite Nova has captured your keen eye, let her gentle light expand the rivers of abundant of Love
